DOC.brief_summary: This multicentric randomized comparison paclitaxel-coated balloon angioplasty paclitaxel-eluting stent implantation patient stable unstable angina evaluation restenosis Quantitative Coronary Analysis .
DOC.brief_title: A COMparison Between PAClitaxel-coated Balloon pacliTaxel-eluting Stent Treatment In-Stent Restenosis ( COMPACT-ISR )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine late luminal loss Quantitative Coronary Analysis 6 month-follow paclitaxel-coated balloon angioplasty paclitaxel-eluting stent implantation treatment in-stent restenosis .
DOC.criteria: informed consent > 18y Stable Angina Unstable Angina Single restenotic lesion previously stented coronary artery Acute Myocardial Infarction within 72h Serum Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL Contraindications ASA , Heparin , Clopidogrel , Ticlopidine , Abciximab , Tirofiban , Paclitaxel Contraindications contrast medium Life expectancy < 2y Target Lesion length > 30mm Target Lesion diameter < = 2.5 mm Target stenosis < 70 % Massive Calcifications target segment Evidence intracoronary thrombus
